To: JA Reception - HO <JAReception-HO@chalhoub.com <mailto:JAReception-HO@chalhoub.com> >
Cc: Yogesh Naresh Patil <yogesh.patil@nascodubai.com <mailto:yogesh.patil@nascodubai.com> >
Subject: Request for Driver - Cheque Collection

 

Dear Reception Team,

Please assign a driver to collect two cheques from the below location tomorrow.

Collection location:
https://goo.gl/maps/4pRYfSPTBsajNQtD8
Dubai Outsource City
Bldg No. 7, 2nd Floor (ASC OFFICE)
Off Academic City Road, Manama St.

Collection timings:
8:00 AM – 4:00 PM
Monday – Thursday

2 Cheques:
CHQ# 125264 — Amount: AED 25,017
CHQ# 125269 — Amount: AED 48,192

Please forward the ID of the driver so that I can share it with the relevant team to validate and release the cheques to the driver.

Also, please provide a copy of the attachments to the driver, either soft or hard copy.

Thank you & Kind Regards,
Hagop

HAGOP GHAZARIAN
